jobDescription: ABOUT FINANCIALFORCE  FinancialForce is the leading cloud ERP for the new services economy. The #1 ERP native to the Salesforce platform, FinancialForce unifies data across the enterprise in real-time, enabling companies to rapidly evolve their business models with customers at the center. Founded in 2009 and headquartered in San Francisco, FinancialForce is backed by Salesforce Ventures, Technology Crossover Ventures, Advent International, and UNIT4. For more information, visit www.financialforce.com.THE ROLE​ We are seeking a highly motivated Sales Operations Analyst to join the worldwide field operations team. It's a great opportunity to gain a broad perspective and have a direct impact on the full customer continuum. The ideal candidate for the role will be self-motivated and detail oriented, able to excel in a start-up environment, and want to develop a strong understanding of enterprise SaaS/Cloud applications.  RESPONSIBILITIES
